meanings.sent1: After the storm passed, the sun started relumining the whole sky.
meanings.sent2: The stars relumining in the night sky brought a sense of peace.
meanings.sent3: The flashlight kept relumining every time I pressed the button, making me feel like a magician.
meanings.sent4: Her smile relumined the room, brightening everyone's mood instantly.
meanings.sent5: The fireflies relumining in the garden created a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The act of shining brightly once more.
meanings.sent1: The relumining of the lighthouse guided the ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent2: The relumining of the city lights after the blackout was a relief to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The sudden relumining of the disco ball turned the party into a dance frenzy.
meanings.sent4: The relumining of hope in her eyes was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The relumining of the fireworks in the sky marked the beginning of the celebration.
